description: Complete system overview detailing the core game architecture, component interactions, and high-level system relationships between cultivation, alchemy, skills, and inventory systems

Comprehensive documentation of all data structures including FCultivationProgress, FCharacterStats, FClassDefinition, FItemDefinition, FSkillDefinition, and their relationships and inheritance hierarchies
Detailed documentation of cultivation mechanics, including Qi calculation algorithms, progression formulas, stage advancement logic, and resource management systems from CultivationComponent
Documentation of alchemy system algorithms including success chance calculations, quality multipliers, ingredient combinations, and cauldron durability mechanics from AlchemySubsystem
Detailed documentation of the skill system including damage calculations, cooldown management, experience gain formulas, and class balance implementation from SkillComponent
